upgrade-spotlight-rollout.userFacingDescription: Experimenting on onboarding content when you upgrade Firefox.

$l10n.text: Don’t forget to back up your data
Make sure important info — like bookmarks and passwords — is updated and protected across all your devices.
An account keeps your important info updated and protected on any device you connect.

messages.targeting: source == 'startup' && !willShowDefaultPrompt && 'browser.newtabpage.activity-stream.asrouter.userprefs.cfr.features'|preferenceValue && !usesFirefoxSync && !hasActiveEnterprisePolicies && userMonthlyActivity[userMonthlyActivity|length - 2][1]|date >= currentDate|date - (28 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000) && !(((currentDate|date - profileAgeCreated|date) / 86400000 >= 168) || totalBookmarksCount >= 35) && os.isWindows && os.windowsVersion >= 6.1 && os.windowsBuildNumber < 22000

$l10n.text: Follow a few simple steps to bring your bookmarks, history, and passwords with you when you get started on a new device.
How to back up my data

messages.targeting: source == 'startup' && !willShowDefaultPrompt && 'browser.newtabpage.activity-stream.asrouter.userprefs.cfr.features'|preferenceValue && !usesFirefoxSync && !hasActiveEnterprisePolicies && userMonthlyActivity[userMonthlyActivity|length - 2][1]|date >= currentDate|date - (28 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000) && !(((currentDate|date - profileAgeCreated|date) / 86400000 >= 168) || totalBookmarksCount >= 35) && !(os.isWindows && os.windowsVersion >= 6.1 && os.windowsBuildNumber < 22000)

device-migration-q4-spotlights.userFacingDescription: Prompt to offer users support in backing up their Firefox data to seamlessly migrate to a new device.

de.device-migration-fxa-spotlight-heavy-use: Stellen Sie sicher, dass wichtige Daten – wie Lesezeichen und Passwörter – auf all Ihren Geräten aktualisiert und geschützt werden.
Vergessen Sie nicht, Ihre Daten zu sichern
de.device-migration-fxa-spotlight-older-dev: Mit einem Konto bleiben Ihre wichtigen Daten auf jedem verbundenen Gerät aktuell und geschützt.
de.device-migration-fxa-spotlight-getting-n: Befolgen Sie nur wenige einfache Schritte, um Ihre Lesezeichen, Chronik und Passwörter bei den ersten Schritten auf einem neuen Gerät mitzunehmen.
Planen Sie die Anschaffung eines neuen Geräts?

fr.device-migration-fxa-spotlight-heavy-use: Assurez-vous que les informations importantes (telles que marque-pages et mots de passe) soient mises à jour et protégées sur tous vos appareils.
N’oubliez pas de sauvegarder vos données
fr.device-migration-fxa-spotlight-older-dev: Un compte garde vos informations importantes à jour et les protège sur tous les appareils auxquels vous vous connectez.
La tranquillité d’esprit, grâce à Firefox
fr.device-migration-fxa-spotlight-getting-n: Suivez quelques étapes simples pour emporter avec vous vos marque-pages, votre historique et vos mots de passe lorsque vous aurez un nouvel appareil.

it.device-migration-fxa-spotlight-heavy-use: Assicurati che le informazioni importanti, come segnalibri e password, siano aggiornate e protette su tutti i tuoi dispositivi.
Non dimenticarti di salvare i tuoi dati
it.device-migration-fxa-spotlight-older-dev: Un account mantiene le tue informazioni importanti aggiornate e protette su qualsiasi dispositivo connesso.
it.device-migration-fxa-spotlight-getting-n: Segui alcuni semplici passaggi per portare con te segnalibri, cronologia e password quando inizi a utilizzare un nuovo dispositivo.
Come posso salvare i miei dati

en-CA.device-migration-fxa-spotlight-heavy-use: Make sure important info — like bookmarks and passwords — is updated and protected across all your devices.
Don’t forget to back up your data
en-CA.device-migration-fxa-spotlight-older-dev: An account keeps your important info updated and protected on any device you connect.
en-CA.device-migration-fxa-spotlight-getting-n: Follow a few simple steps to bring your bookmarks, history, and passwords with you when you get started on a new device.
Hoping for a new device this season?
How to back up my data
